title: Tired of losing games because our team didn't pick hard cc against a Yi
body:
When I said all Master Yi has to do was Q Q Q to get a Penta kill. I wasn't speaking on metaphorical terms, it meant it literally as well. Riot, you need to change his ultimate Highlander to reduce cc, not eliminate it. I'm really sick of having a team without reliable hard cc that I know will lose once the late game starts. If this happens again, I'm just going to start rage quitting because I already know it's over once Yi is the last to pick and nobody on our team has hard CC.

http://imgur.com/gallery/pZamAD8

P.S Someone stole my Vladimir again.

4 if you count Caitlin's trap. Which you don't need to since thresh + Cass is more than enough to deal with yi
